module.name: part_external_reference
module.keywords: module. external reference, electrical, electronic, piece part

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of the information needed to provide external reference capability for part and terminal identification.

inscope.li: items within the scope of application module Physical layout template, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1722.

aa.refpath: representation representation.items[i] -> {representation_item representation_item.name = 'design owner'} representation_item => descriptive_representation_item
representation representation.items[i] -> {representation_item representation_item.name = 'part number'} representation_item => descriptive_representation_item
representation representation.items[i] -> {representation_item representation_item.name = 'revision code'} representation_item => descriptive_representation_item
representation representation.items[i] -> {representation_item representation_item.name = 'product definition id'} representation_item => descriptive_representation_item

ae.refpath: descriptive_representation_item <= {representation_item representation_item.name = 'package terminal external reference'} representation_item

aa.refpath: descriptive_representation_item <= representation_item <- representation.items[i] {representation representation.name = 'package external reference'} representation

representation representation.items[i] -> {representation_item representation_item.name = 'feature name'} representation_item => descriptive_representation_item descriptive_representation_item.description

representation representation.items[i] -> {representation_item representation_item.name = 'feature type'} representation_item => descriptive_representation_item descriptive_representation_item.description

representation <- property_definition_representation.used_representation property_definition_representation property_definition_representation.definition -> property_definition property_definition.definition -> characterized_definition = characterized_product_definition characterized_product_definition = product_definition product_definition => physical_unit

representation <- property_definition_representation.used_representation property_definition_representation property_definition_representation.definition -> property_definition property_definition.definition -> characterized_definition = shape_definition shape_definition = shape_aspect shape_aspect => part_template_definition
